remarks: Vector base set of a dual vector space of functionals with closed kernels.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lcdvbase.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcdvbase.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdvbase.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdvbase.v $e |- V = ( Base ` C ) $.
lcdvbase.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdvbase.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
lcdvbase.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
lcdvbase.b $e |- B = { f e. F | ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` ( L ` f ) ) ) = ( L ` f ) } $.
lcdvbase.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcdvbase $p |- ( ph -> V = B ) $.
$d F f $.
$d K f $.
$d W f $.
